to be added to the employee's bonuses in denomination token","_employeeId":"Employee's identifier"}},"addEmployee(address,uint256,uint64,string)":{"params":{"_accountAddress":"Employee's address to receive payroll","_initialDenominationSalary":"Employee's salary, per second in denomination token","_role":"Employee's role","_startDate":"Employee's starting timestamp in seconds (it actually sets their initial lastPayroll value)"}},"addReimbursement(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"Amount to be added to the employee's reimbursements in denomination token","_employeeId":"Employee's identifier"}},"allowRecoverability(address)":{"details":"By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable","params":{"token":"Token address that would be recovered"},"return":"bool whether the app allows the recovery"},"canForward(address,bytes)":{"details":"IForwarder interface conformance. Tells whether a given address can forward actions or not.","params":{"_sender":"Address of the account intending to forward an action"},"return":"True if the given address is an active employee, false otherwise"},"canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[])":{"details":"Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app","params":{"_params":"Permission params for the role","_role":"Role on this app","_sender":"Sender of the call"},"return":"Boolean indicating whether the sender has the permissions to perform the action.        Always returns false if the app hasn't been initialized yet."},"changeAddressByEmployee(address)":{"details":"Initialization check is implicitly provided by `employeeMatches` as new employees can     only be added via `addEmployee(),` which requires initialization.     As the employee is allowed to call this, we enforce non-reentrancy.","params":{"_newAccountAddress":"New address to receive payments for the requesting employee"}},"determineAllocation(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"Initialization check is implicitly provided by `employeeMatches` as new employees can     only be added via `addEmployee(),` which requires initialization.     As the employee is allowed to call this, we enforce non-reentrancy.","params":{"_distribution":"Array with each token's corresponding proportions (must be integers summing to 100)","_tokens":"Array of token addresses; they must belong to the list of allowed tokens"}},"forward(bytes)":{"details":"IForwarder interface conformance. Allows active employees to run EVMScripts in the context of the Payroll app.","params":{"_evmScript":"Script being executed"}},"getAllocation(uint256,address)":{"details":"Get an employee's payment allocation for a token","params":{"_employeeId":"Employee's identifier","_token":"Token to query the payment allocation for"},"return":"Employee's payment allocation for the token being queried"},"getEmployee(uint256)":{"details":"Return all information for employee by their ID","params":{"_employeeId":"Employee's identifier"},"return":"Employee's address to receive paymentsEmployee's salary, per second in denomination tokenEmployee's accrued salaryEmployee's bonus amountEmployee's reimbursements amountEmployee's last payment dateEmployee's termination date (max uint64 if none)Employee's allowed payment tokens"},"getEmployeeIdByAddress(address)":{"details":"Return employee's identifier by their account address","params":{"_accountAddress":"Employee's address to receive payments"},"return":"Employee's identifier"},"getInitializationBlock()":{"return":"Block number in which the contract was initialized"},"getRecoveryVault()":{"details":"Get the recovery vault for the app","return":"Recovery vault address for the app"},"getTotalOwedSalary(uint256)":{"details":"Get owed salary since last payroll for an employee. It will take into account the accrued salary as well.     The result will be capped to max uint256 to avoid having an overflow.","return":"Employee's total owed salary: current owed payroll since the last payroll date, plus the accrued salary."},"hasInitialized()":{"return":"Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block"},"initialize(address,address,address,uint64)":{"details":"Note that we do not require _denominationToken to be a contract, as it may be a \"fake\"     address used by the price feed to denominate fiat currencies","params":{"_denominationToken":"Address of the denomination token used for salary accounting","_finance":"Address of the Finance app this Payroll app will rely on for payments (non-changeable)","_priceFeed":"Address of the price feed","_rateExpiryTime":"Acceptable expiry time in seconds for the price feed's exchange rates"}},"isForwarder()":{"details":"IForwarder interface conformance. Tells whether the Payroll app is a forwarder or not.","return":"Always true"},"isTokenAllowed(address)":{"details":"Check if a token is allowed to be used for payments","params":{"_token":"Address of the token to be checked"},"return":"True if the given token is allowed, false otherwise"},"payday(uint8,uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"Reverts if no payments were made.     Initialization check is implicitly provided by `employeeMatches` as new employees can     only be added via `addEmployee(),` which requires initialization.     As the employee is allowed to call this, we enforce non-reentrancy.","params":{"_minRates":"Array of employee's minimum acceptable rates for their allowed payment tokens","_requestedAmount":"Requested amount to pay for the payment type. Must be less than or equal to total owed amount for the payment type, or zero to request all.","_type":"Payment type being requested (Payroll, Reimbursement or Bonus)"}},"setAllowedToken(address,bool)":{"params":{"_allowed":"Boolean to tell whether the given token should be added or removed from the list","_token":"Address of the token to be added or removed from the list of allowed tokens for payments"}},"setEmployeeSalary(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This reverts if either the employee's owed salary or accrued salary overflows, to avoid     losing any accrued salary for an employee due to the employer changing their salary.","params":{"_denominationSalary":"Employee's new salary, per second in denomination token","_employeeId":"Employee's identifier"}},"setPriceFeed(address)":{"params":{"_feed":"Address of the new price feed instance"}},"setRateExpiryTime(uint64)":{"details":"Exchange rates older than the given value won't be accepted for payments and will cause payouts to revert","params":{"_time":"The expiration time in seconds for exchange rates"}},"terminateEmployee(uint256,uint64)":{"params":{"_employeeId":"Employee's identifier","_endDate":"Termination timestamp in seconds"}},"transferToVault(address)":{"params":{"_token":"Token balance to be sent to recovery vault."}}},"title":"Payroll in multiple currencies"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addBonus(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Add `_amount` to bonus for employee #`_employeeId`"},"addEmployee(address,uint256,uint64,string)":{"notice":"Add employee with address `_accountAddress` to payroll with an salary of `_initialDenominationSalary` per second, starting on `@formatDate(_startDate)`"},"addReimbursement(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Add `_amount` to reimbursements for employee #`_employeeId`"},"changeAddressByEmployee(address)":{"notice":"Change your employee account address to `_newAccountAddress`"},"determineAllocation(address[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Set the token distribution for your payments"},"forward(bytes)":{"notice":"Execute desired action as an active employee"},"initialize(address,address,address,uint64)":{"notice":"Initialize Payroll app for Finance at `_finance` and price feed at `_priceFeed`, setting denomination token to `_token` and exchange rate expiry time to `@transformTime(_rateExpiryTime)`"},"payday(uint8,uint256,uint256[])":{"notice":"Request your `_type == 0 ? 'salary' : _type == 1 ? 'reimbursements' : 'bonus'`"},"setAllowedToken(address,bool)":{"notice":"`_allowed ? 'Add' : 'Remove'` `_token.symbol(): string` `_allowed ? 'to' : 'from'` the set of allowed tokens"},"setEmployeeSalary(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Set employee #`_employeeId`'s salary to `_denominationSalary` per second"},"setPriceFeed(address)":{"notice":"Set the price feed for exchange rates to `_feed`"},"setRateExpiryTime(uint64)":{"notice":"Set the acceptable expiry time for the price feed's exchange rates to `@transformTime(_time)`"},"terminateEmployee(uint256,uint64)":{"notice":"Terminate employee #`_employeeId` on `@formatDate(_endDate)`"},"transferToVault(address)":{"notice":"Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds,        but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them."}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"@aragon/apps-payroll/contracts/Payroll.sol":"Payroll"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":10000},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"@aragon/apps-finance/contracts/Finance.sol":{"keccak256":"0xafc1ce43dacd96650713ee23b76e9af1fecdc2c2ceaa182b2d9b0227fcdc279d","urls":["bzzr://8decf865d0751bc38c94685437815d4b03ee898e370c6f94330573a43fa8fe0e"]},"@aragon/apps-payroll/contracts/Payroll.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd47a22903b2f0159b7002e3105d716311f8cb209e26c80c1ae26dc40c3ecebad","urls":["bzzr://104b7b918f1f4dc587da128bf004a86037843e3e1d928bb81aba8b5bd6dd5452"]},"@aragon/apps-vault/contracts/Vault.sol":{"keccak256":"0x760b4fd895153fd398391df3b27474d1913d792fadec2172dd10d3686d3416e6","urls":["bzzr://319b753d448e834740429bcb046a02eef5ad0e50b60a63ada89ebd53bf1c112b"]},"@aragon/os/contracts/acl/ACLSyntaxSugar.sol":{"keccak256":"0x519915c14576b679b5ed5767d6b21b44a13aa7ae2fe7b33664ca364fafc33e00","urls":["bzzr://8d899afdbf161eaa5e6ce6a68d9ea420c3f98a00a71d70b293e8de8771e6aa62"]},"@aragon/os/contracts/acl/IACL.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe3492bc29d2482e65d2e39c96487b5388f6181f6bcdc6fe6329b8206b84c0cf1","urls":["bzzr://3af0b7e423c7ff4100a3b5868203ec169c866328f2d93d3b6a2111e916cdc411"]},"@aragon/os/contracts/apps/AppStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb1c8eb71d1bdfe1241cc1714b280b46bbfc5bcb1e8499d42c24d3f5f5e8130f1","urls":["bzzr://503beec9e0e19834cb685a1d037eb9caaa412e3709d90bf6e53f51d143d58029"]},"@aragon/os/contracts/apps/AragonApp.sol":{"keccak256":"0xba456000d65bea8d9d82e9f1789086c3777df68fe364f8f397973b6d579f3a2a","urls":["bzzr://85ae9658277830a9454e34e319f8fbcb27d4e015d3bb1219c4d42ec33b9a184e"]},"@aragon/os/contracts/common/Autopetrified.sol":{"keccak256":"0x216e6ecbdcf45d90e8846ab2773072bd82180558a7dcf0c5425ed13b0188c5f3","urls":["bzzr://95b7ec6b2e8d3d8cd8c02f9be8b17d715c48a35445ba194429cca5264bfd0435"]},"@aragon/os/contracts/common/ConversionHelpers.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9872383d458352f5c68fa5afd1fc84ab6b172cbee33359cf params._amount: Amount to be added to the employee's bonuses in denomination token

params._initialDenominationSalary: Employee's salary, per second in denomination token
params._startDate: Employee's starting timestamp in seconds (it actually sets their initial lastPayroll value)

params._amount: Amount to be added to the employee's reimbursements in denomination token

allowRecoverability(address).details: By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable

params.token: Token address that would be recovered

allowRecoverability(address).return: bool whether the app allows the recovery

canForward(address,bytes).details: IForwarder interface conformance. Tells whether a given address can forward actions or not.

params._sender: Address of the account intending to forward an action

canForward(address,bytes).return: True if the given address is an active employee, false otherwise

canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).details: Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app
canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).return: Boolean indicating whether the sender has the permissions to perform the action.        Always returns false if the app hasn't been initialized yet.

changeAddressByEmployee(address).details: Initialization check is implicitly provided by `employeeMatches` as new employees can     only be added via `addEmployee(),` which requires initialization.     As the employee is allowed to call this, we enforce non-reentrancy.

params._newAccountAddress: New address to receive payments for the requesting employee

determineAllocation(address[],uint256[]).details: Initialization check is implicitly provided by `employeeMatches` as new employees can     only be added via `addEmployee(),` which requires initialization.     As the employee is allowed to call this, we enforce non-reentrancy.

params._distribution: Array with each token's corresponding proportions (must be integers summing to 100)
params._tokens: Array of token addresses; they must belong to the list of allowed tokens

forward(bytes).details: IForwarder interface conformance. Allows active employees to run EVMScripts in the context of the Payroll app.

getAllocation(uint256,address).details: Get an employee's payment allocation for a token

params._token: Token to query the payment allocation for

getAllocation(uint256,address).return: Employee's payment allocation for the token being queried

getEmployee(uint256).details: Return all information for employee by their ID
getEmployee(uint256).return: Employee's address to receive paymentsEmployee's salary, per second in denomination tokenEmployee's accrued salaryEmployee's bonus amountEmployee's reimbursements amountEmployee's last payment dateEmployee's termination date (max uint64 if none)Employee's allowed payment tokens

getEmployeeIdByAddress(address).details: Return employee's identifier by their account address

getInitializationBlock().return: Block number in which the contract was initialized

getRecoveryVault().details: Get the recovery vault for the app
getRecoveryVault().return: Recovery vault address for the app

getTotalOwedSalary(uint256).details: Get owed salary since last payroll for an employee. It will take into account the accrued salary as well.     The result will be capped to max uint256 to avoid having an overflow.
getTotalOwedSalary(uint256).return: Employee's total owed salary: current owed payroll since the last payroll date, plus the accrued salary.

hasInitialized().return: Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block

initialize(address,address,address,uint6.details: Note that we do not require _denominationToken to be a contract, as it may be a "fake"     address used by the price feed to denominate fiat currencies

params._denominationToken: Address of the denomination token used for salary accounting
params._finance: Address of the Finance app this Payroll app will rely on for payments (non-changeable)
params._rateExpiryTime: Acceptable expiry time in seconds for the price feed's exchange rates

isForwarder().details: IForwarder interface conformance. Tells whether the Payroll app is a forwarder or not.

isTokenAllowed(address).details: Check if a token is allowed to be used for payments

params._token: Address of the token to be checked

isTokenAllowed(address).return: True if the given token is allowed, false otherwise

payday(uint8,uint256,uint256[]).details: Reverts if no payments were made.     Initialization check is implicitly provided by `employeeMatches` as new employees can     only be added via `addEmployee(),` which requires initialization.     As the employee is allowed to call this, we enforce non-reentrancy.

params._minRates: Array of employee's minimum acceptable rates for their allowed payment tokens
params._requestedAmount: Requested amount to pay for the payment type. Must be less than or equal to total owed amount for the payment type, or zero to request all.
params._type: Payment type being requested (Payroll, Reimbursement or Bonus)

params._allowed: Boolean to tell whether the given token should be added or removed from the list
params._token: Address of the token to be added or removed from the list of allowed tokens for payments

setEmployeeSalary(uint256,uint256).details: This reverts if either the employee's owed salary or accrued salary overflows, to avoid     losing any accrued salary for an employee due to the employer changing their salary.

params._denominationSalary: Employee's new salary, per second in denomination token

params._feed: Address of the new price feed instance

setRateExpiryTime(uint64).details: Exchange rates older than the given value won't be accepted for payments and will cause payouts to revert

params._time: The expiration time in seconds for exchange rates

params._token: Token balance to be sent to recovery vault.

addEmployee(address,uint256,uint64,strin.notice: Add employee with address `_accountAddress` to payroll with an salary of `_initialDenominationSalary` per second, starting on `@formatDate(_startDate)`

changeAddressByEmployee(address).notice: Change your employee account address to `_newAccountAddress`

determineAllocation(address[],uint256[]).notice: Set the token distribution for your payments

forward(bytes).notice: Execute desired action as an active employee

initialize(address,address,address,uint6.notice: Initialize Payroll app for Finance at `_finance` and price feed at `_priceFeed`, setting denomination token to `_token` and exchange rate expiry time to `@transformTime(_rateExpiryTime)`

setAllowedToken(address,bool).notice: `_allowed ? 'Add' : 'Remove'` `_token.symbol(): string` `_allowed ? 'to' : 'from'` the set of allowed tokens

setEmployeeSalary(uint256,uint256).notice: Set employee #`_employeeId`'s salary to `_denominationSalary` per second

setPriceFeed(address).notice: Set the price feed for exchange rates to `_feed`

setRateExpiryTime(uint64).notice: Set the acceptable expiry time for the price feed's exchange rates to `@transformTime(_time)`

transferToVault(address).notice: Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds,        but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them.
